name: Formula GP
overview: Formula GP is a Racing game, published by Midas Interactive Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 2003. Formula GP is a Formula 1 racing game that features 8 different circuits around the world (all of them are ficticious since the game doesn't have the FIA licences): - Inter Seca - Hiselring - Road Anderston - Scofield Island - Autogarten - Nocvest Arena - Hill Valley - Boulder Raceway The game lack of different game modes since the player can only choose in which circuit he want to drive, but the handling of the cars is good.
